duties_responsibilities.duty: Watch and report on live sports events, recording game statistics and data.
Participate in a training and testing program to ensure accurate data collection and analysis.
Maintain regular availability on weekends and weekday evenings for game coverage.
Utilize above-average knowledge of various sports (American Football, Basketball, Volleyball, Ice Hockey, Soccer) to provide accurate and detailed game analyses.
Use smartphone technology to record and report live events during sports matches.
